title: Google Keep Notes often gives me duplicate notifications for reminders. How do I stop them?
content:
At least some of the time, I know the duplicates appear when I try to swipe away a Keep reminder. I'm not certain that is the only time the duplicates appear.

I've had this issue for at least a year, with both my Moto X4 and with my new Pixel 4a.

I've already tried clearing the Keep Notes data and cache, uninstalling the application, and finally reinstalling it, yet the issue persists.

It might or might not be related to this person's issue: https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/asnghf/duplicate_notifications_from_google_keep_upon/
